parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Flags

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets flag [[Side]]. A flag may be taken by any unit that is enemy to the side that owns the flag. Just like with [[setFlagTexture]], if the command executed where unit is [[local]] effect of the command will be global and [[Multiplayer Scripting#Join In Progress|JIP]] compatible.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> flag '''setFlagSide''' side

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> flag: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> side: [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_flag1 [[setFlagSide]] [[east]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Capturable OPFOR flag:<code>[[private]] _flag = "FlagPole_F" [[createVehicle]] [[position]] [[player]];
_flag [[setFlagTexture]] "\A3\Data_F\Flags\Flag_CSAT_CO.paa";
_flag [[setFlagSide]] [[east]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[flag]], [[flagOwner]], [[setFlagOwner]], [[setFlagTexture]], [[flagSide]], [[flagTexture]], [[setFlagAnimationPhase]], [[flagAnimationPhase]], [[forceFlagTexture]], [[getForcedFlagTexture]], [[Flag Textures]]
</value></part></template>
